original_text: And the border went out unto the side of Ekron northward: and the border was drawn to Shicron, and passed along to mount Baalah, and went out unto Jabneel; and the goings out of the border were at the sea.
korean_text: 또 에그론 비탈 북쪽으로 나아가 식그론으로 접어들어 바알라 산을 지나고 얍느엘에 이르나니 그 끝은 바다며

sentences.original_text: unto the side of Ekron northward
and the border was drawn to Shicron
and passed along to mount Baalah
and the goings out of the border were at the sea
